articles.title: Why Everyone Thinks 'Tár' Is Based on a True Story - The Cut
articles.description: Several viewers of the film ‘Tár,’ which stars Cate Blanchett as a disgraced conductor of the Berlin Philharmonic, have confused Lydia Tár for a real person.
articles.content: When I left the theater after watching Tár for two hours and 38 minutes, I immediately fumbled for my phone. I couldnt wait to see actual footage of the story I had just seen and was so ready for my … [+6857 chars]
